subject: Update/add/remove documentation
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Ensure script preambles have proper JSDoc-style documentation. Update any relevant docs if needed.

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`, `/jsdoc-best-practices`

**Verification:**
- Type: documentation
- Command: `head -20 scripts/lisa-update-local.sh && head -20 scripts/lisa-commit-and-pr-local.sh`
- Expected: Both scripts have proper preamble documentation

verification.expected: Both scripts have proper preamble documentation
